contentList.content: You gain a bonus to your Persuasion, Deception, and Intimidation <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> equal to your Intelligence <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>.
You gain a bonus to your Persuasion, Deception, and Intimidation <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> equal to your Intelligence <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>.

<LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Intelligence</LSTag> increased to 28 and you gain a bonus to your Persuasion, Deception, and Intimidation <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> equal to your Intelligence <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>.
This potion looks, smells, and tastes a lot like beer...

Gain an extra action, a +2 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>, and double your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag>.
This solution ripples and splashes of its own accord, almost like it's trying to escape the bottle.

The scent assaults your palate with a fetid amalgam of humic rot and ferric undertones. But surprisingly it tastes like fresh jasmine tea with the purest of honey. That's one way to keep others from stealing your things.
You gain a bonus to your Persuasion, Deception, and Intimidation <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> equal to your Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>.
You gain a bonus to your Persuasion, Deception, and Intimidation <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> equal to your Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>.
You gain a bonus to your Persuasion, Deception, and Intimidation <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> equal to your Strength <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>.

You gain +[1] <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">armour class</LSTag>, +[1] <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag>, +[1] to all <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">saving throws</LSTag>, all <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="RangedSpellAttack">ranged spell attack</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">ranged weapon attacks</LSTag>, [2] extra <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ActionPoint">Action Points</LSTag>, [2] extra <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Actions</LSTag>, damage reduction of [3], <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">advantage</LSTag> on all <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">saving throws</LSTag>, all <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>, and <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attacks</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">resistance</LSTag> to acid, cold, fire, lightning, thunder, force, psychic, necrotic, poison, radiant, slashing, piercing, bludgeoning, <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Charm and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>.

Gain an extra action, a +2 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>, and double your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag>.
This solution ripples and splashes of its own accord, almost like it's trying to escape the bottle.
You gain a bonus to your Persuasion, Deception, and Intimidation <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> equal to your Intelligence <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>.
At least it doesn't taste like soap. Ah, fond childhood memories.
Let me tell you a story about something completely unrelated.
You feel twitchy just from the aroma this gives off.
Intelligence is knowing this is alcoholic. Wisdom is knowing not to chug it all on an empty stomach.
If words don't work, the bottle doubles as a decent club.
Used by many wizards who needed to pull an all night study session.
You gain a bonus to your Persuasion, Deception, and Intimidation <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> equal to your Strength <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>.
You gain a bonus to your Persuasion, Deception, and Intimidation <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> equal to your Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>.

You gain +[1] <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">armour class</LSTag>, +[1] initiative, <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SURPRISED">Surprised</LSTag>, Charm, and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>, +[1] <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag>, +[1] to <LSTag Tooltip="SpellDifficultyClass">Spell Save DC</LSTag>, +[1] to <LSTag Tooltip="SkillCheck">Skill Checks</LSTag>, +[2] <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ActionPoint">Action</LSTag>, +[2] <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>, +[1] and <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">advantage</LSTag> on all <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">saving throws</LSTag>, +[1] and <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attacks</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">advantage</LSTag> on all <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>, damage reduction of [3] to all damage types, <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">resistance</LSTag> to acid, cold, fire, lightning, thunder, force, psychic, necrotic, poison, radiant, slashing, piercing, bludgeoning.

You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>, +[1] <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag>, your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> increases to 28, and you have

You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>, your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> increases to 28, you have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">advantage</LSTag> on Strength <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>, and your maximum <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> are increased by 15.
A better question would be what doesn't it do?

You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>, +15 <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag>, your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> increases to 28, and you have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">advantage</LSTag> on Strength <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>.
You gain a bonus to your Persuasion, Deception, and Intimidation <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> equal to your Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>.

<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> When the condition ends, you become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HUNGOVER">Hungover</LSTag>. Also, there's a very recognizable <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STENCH">Stench</LSTag> about you.

You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>, your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> increases to 28, you have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">advantage</LSTag> on Strength <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>, and your maximum <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> are increased by [1].

Lotions and Potions of High Stats
No hags were harmed in the making of... who am I kidding? Of course they were harmed!
You are invulnerable to all damage.
You gain +[1] to all skill checks and have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">advantage</LSTag> on all <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>.

[1] Damage Reduction to all damage types, +[2] to Initiative, +[3] to <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">advantage</LSTag> to all <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">saving throws</LSTag>. You ignore the effects of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag>, and cannot be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PARALYZED">Paralysed</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restrained</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="WEB">Enwebbed</LSTag>, Entangled, or Ensnared and can't slip on grease or ice.

You gain +[1] and <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">advantage</LSTag> on all <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">saving throws</LSTag> as well as +[2] to your <LSTag Tooltip="SpellDifficultyClass">Spell Save DC</LSTag>.
You gain +[1] to all skill checks and have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">advantage</LSTag> on all <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>.
Master of none, but still better than a master of one.

[1] Damage Reduction to all damage types, +[2] to Initiative, +[3] to <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">advantage</LSTag> to all <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">saving throws</LSTag>. You can dance if you want to.
